title: How to Hide Your Battle History in Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

steps.title: Open Mobile Legends.
steps.content: Open Mobile Legends. After opening, click on the gear icon.

steps.title: Go to the Privacy section.
steps.content: Go to the Privacy section. It is the last section in Settings.

steps.title: Select the way you want to show your history.
steps.content: Select the way you want to show your history. You either have three sections to show your battle history. By default, you will have all players see your battle history, but you can toggle this to show your battle history to your friends only, or you can opt to hide it for all players.

steps.title: Toggle your battle history to Friends/Hide to All.
steps.content: Toggle your battle history to Friends/Hide to All. Your battle history is now hidden from most players! Those that see your profile will now get a screen that says "History has been hidden." Your match results cannot be seen if a user sees this message.
